statements: SELECT * FROM currency_transactions WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT player_id, amount FROM currency_transactions WHERE currency_type = 'gold' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_type FROM currency_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, currency_type, amount FROM currency_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT AVG(amount) AS avg_amount, MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM currency_transactions;
SELECT * FROM currency_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, amount ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT player_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM currency_transactions WHERE currency_type = 'USD' GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT DISTINCT currency_type FROM currency_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'withdrawal'
SELECT * FROM currency_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_type = 'deposit' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT player_id) AS total_players, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM currency_transactions
SELECT * FROM currency_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_type FROM currency_transactions WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, balance FROM economy_balance ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM currency_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit';
SELECT player_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM economy_balance GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM currency_transactions WHERE player_id = 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT player_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM economy_balance GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_balance > 1000 ORDER BY total_balance DESC;
SELECT player_id, MAX(balance) AS highest_balance FROM economy_balance GROUP BY player_id HAVING highest_balance > 500 ORDER BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_amount FROM currency_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit' GROUP BY player_id HAVING average_amount > 5000 ORDER BY player_id;

SELECT player_id, transaction_type, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM currency_transactions GROUP BY player_id, transaction_type HAVING transaction_count > 2 ORDER BY transaction_count DESC, transaction_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM currency_transactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_type, amount FROM currency_transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM currency_transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM currency_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT description FROM economy_logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM currency_transactions WHERE user_id = 10 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_type FROM currency_transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM currency_transactions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM user_balance WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT log_id, description, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM log_date) AS log_month FROM economy_logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM currency_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, date_time FROM currency_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM currency_transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT currency_code, exchange_rate FROM currency_exchange_rates WHERE exchange_rate > 1.0;
SELECT loot_name, loot_value FROM currency_loot ORDER BY loot_value DESC;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM currency_transactions WHERE transaction_type='Deposit' ORDER BY date_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_currency_balance WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT currency_code, exchange_rate FROM currency_exchange_rates WHERE exchange_rate > 1.0 ORDER BY exchange_rate DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM currency_loot WHERE loot_value BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY loot_name ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_type, amount, date_time FROM currency_transactions WHERE amount < 0 ORDER BY date_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT player_id, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM transactions GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_spent > 1000;
SELECT player_id, item_name, quantity FROM inventory JOIN items ON inventory.item_id = items.item_id WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE balance < 0 ORDER BY balance ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT currency_name, exchange_rate FROM currencies WHERE exchange_rate > 1.5;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT player_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_amount > 1000
SELECT player_id, username, balance FROM players JOIN transactions ON players.player_id = transactions.player_id WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY balance DESC
SELECT item_name, COUNT(item_id) AS item_count FROM items JOIN inventory ON items.item_id = inventory.item_id GROUP BY item_id ORDER BY item_count DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT currency_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM currencies JOIN inventory USING (currency_id) GROUP BY currency_name HAVING total_quantity < 1000
